questions.text: Is the individual doing any form of paid work?
questions.name: paid-employment

questions.text: Does the individual have a basic skills need that the jobcentre can support them with?
questions.name: basic-offer

questions.text: Has the JCP offer already helped the individual with their core job search activity?
questions.hint: Core jobsearch activity includes basic job search skills, tasks such as CV writing, use of email and Universal Jobmatch.
questions.name: previous-jcp-offer

questions.text: Does the person commit to taking a job if the Work and Health Programme helps them find one?
questions.name: next-twelve-with-support

questions.text: Is there any other provision which would be more suited for the individual's needs and help them to find work?
questions.name: other-provision
